Title: The Kite Runner
Actors: Khalid Abdalla, Atossa Leoni, Shaun Toub, Sayed Jafar Masihullah Gharibzada
Plot: After spending years in California, Amir returns to his homeland in Afghanistan to help his old friend Hassan, whose son is in trouble.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 6 wins & 24 nominations.
Production: Sidney Kimmel Entertainment, Neal Street Productions, MacDonald-Parkes
